author: Michael Kimmelman
title: Coronavirus: Photographs reveal the world’s great cities as ghost towns
description: The places where people flocked to, the plazas, beaches, fairgrounds, restaurants, movie theaters, tourist meccas and train stations, all now lie empty
content:
The places where people flocked to, the plazas, beaches, fairgrounds, restaurants, movie theaters, tourist meccas and train stations, all now lie empty
